access: This feat is available to all players in a Stolen Fate campaign
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Restore Omen](/Feats.aspx?ID=4156) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Stolen Fate Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=197) pg. 14</row>

**Archetype** [Harrower](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=204)

**Access**
This feat is available to all players in a Stolen Fate campaign

**Requirements**
You do not have an active harrow omen.

</column>

---

You spend 10 minutes meditating with your harrow deck, then draw a card. The suit of the card grants you a new harrow omen.
name: Restore Omen
requirement: You do not have an active harrow omen.
requirement_markdown: You do not have an active harrow omen.
